content.html: This guy got banned for saying AIDS that was preferable to people supporting trans rights. Then, @TwitterSafety unbanned him (for reasons past understanding) and @jk_rowling was there to welcome him back with applause. In. Plain. Sight.
content.value:
This guy got banned for saying AIDS that was preferable to people supporting trans rights. Then, @TwitterSafety unbanned him (for reasons past understanding) and @jk_rowling was there to welcome him back with applause. 

In. Plain. Sight.
